topic: Create a video about squaring the circle

scenes.title: Introduction to Squaring the Circle
scenes.narration_summary: Hook with the basic problem statement and why it's intriguing

scenes.title: Historical Attempts
scenes.narration_summary: Brief history of attempts to square the circle from ancient times to the 19th century
risk_flags: Multiple simultaneous objects if showing timeline

scenes.title: The Mathematical Impossibility
scenes.narration_summary: Explanation of why squaring the circle is impossible using properties of π and transcendental numbers

scenes.title: Attempting the Construction
scenes.narration_summary: Geometric demonstration of why compass and straightedge cannot construct the required side length
risk_flags: Geometric animations may require precise positioning

scenes.title: Broader Mathematical Context
scenes.narration_summary: Connection to other famous problems and the development of mathematical rigor

scenes.title: Recap and Legacy
scenes.narration_summary: Summary of why squaring the circle matters and its lasting impact on mathematics
